markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Matchmaker Fulu](/Equipment.aspx?ID=980)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Fulu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=378" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 160 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attempt a [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) check to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50).

 
</row>

</column>

---

This red fulu contains blessings for one's relationship from [Shelyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=17), goddess of beauty and love. You get a +2 status bonus to the Diplomacy check, and if you roll a critical failure on the check, you get a failure instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Matchmaker Fulu
